metadata.synopsis: Nettie is the apprentice of Halsin, the missing druid. We can tell her about the parasite in our heads. She listens with compassion but decides the player is too dangerous and must be quarantined. If she knows about the parasite, she'll invite the player to come with her deeper into her rooms for "treatement."

24.speaker: Nettie
24.text: First you save us from goblins, then Kagha's treachery. You're making your mark.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.NodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.

27.speaker: Nettie
27.text: Give me a moment. I'll be right with you.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looks back to the injured bird after glancing at the playerNodeContext: Looks back to the injured bird after glancing at the player

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Is there anything I can do to help?
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still working on the birdNodeContext: Working on bird, doesn't look up at player

25.speaker: Nettie
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still working on the birdNodeContext: Working on bird, doesn't look up at player

22.speaker: Nettie
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Casts spell (healing word) on the bird.NodeContext: A quietly murmured spell

46.speaker: Nettie
46.text: There. It's up to her now. Life or death.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still looking at the birdNodeContext: Still looking at the bird

49.speaker: Nettie
49.text: Now, what was it you needed?
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns to the playerNodeContext: Turns to player

68.speaker: Player
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine themNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine them

38.speaker: Nettie
38.text: You found her. But I still don't know what she can do for you.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine themNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine them

92.speaker: Player
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine themNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine them

6.speaker: Nettie
6.text: Come here. Let's have a look at you.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine themNodeContext: Approaches the player to examine them

36.speaker: Nettie
36.text: You seem healthy enough. A bit tired 'round the eyes, maybe.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Examines the player, carefully looking them up and and down.NodeContext: Examines the player, carefully looking them up and and down.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: No good way of putting this. I... uh... have a tadpole in my head.
77.context: NodeContext: Suddenly grave, giving you her full attention. A mind flayer is an incredibly dangerous creature.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Everything about me is sick. The dizzy spells, the memory loss, the illithid parasite...
11.context: NodeContext: Suddenly grave, giving you her full attention. A mind flayer is an incredibly dangerous creature.

5.speaker: Nettie
5.text: A tadpole? A mind flayer tadpole?
5.context: NodeContext: Suddenly grave, giving you her full attention. A mind flayer is an incredibly dangerous creature.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: You know of them? Can you help me?
33.context: NodeContext: Sadly. She's realising she'll have to kill the player.

28.speaker: Nettie
28.text: I - I'll do what I can.
28.context: NodeContext: Sadly. She's realising she'll have to kill the player.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: What other kinds are there? It's not like a frog hopped in my eye.

45.speaker: Nettie
45.text: Come, follow me. I might be able to help.
45.context: NodeContext: In command, but grave. She's decided she has to kill the player.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Actually, never mind. I'll get help elsewhere.
50.context: NodeContext: Urgent 'No!' you can't just let them walk out of here. It's a dangerous situation.

16.speaker: Nettie
16.context: NodeContext: Urgent 'No!' you can't just let them walk out of here. It's a dangerous situation.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: More than tired. Something crawled into my eye.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking closely at the player's eyesNodeContext: Looking closely at the player's eyes. Starts jovial, then realises something horrible

10.speaker: Nettie
10.text: Crawled in? Some sort of bug or - wait...
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking closely at the player's eyesNodeContext: Looking closely at the player's eyes. Starts jovial, then realises something horrible

87.speaker: Nettie
87.text: Did it look like a tadpole? But from your worst nightmare? All slime, teeth, and tentacles?
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Steps back, NodeContext: Steps back. You realise the player might be very dangerous, but don't want to spook them.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Right. Yes, I'm... very tired indeed.

35.speaker: Nettie
35.text: Then get some rest. There's no better magic.

64.speaker: Nettie
64.text: Take a nip of whiskey before bed if you need to. Come back to me if that doesn't do it.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: Do you know anything about mind flayers?
97.context: NodeContext: Cautious. You've just asked what she knows about very dangerous creatures.

59.speaker: Nettie
59.context: NodeContext: Cautious. You've just asked what she knows about very dangerous creatures.

91.speaker: Player
91.context: NodeContext: Suspects you're not telling her everything

53.speaker: Player
53.context: NodeContext: Suspects you're not telling her everything

74.speaker: Nettie
74.text: I know they're nasty creatures. Can get in your head and convince you up is down.
74.context: NodeContext: Suspects you're not telling her everything

19.speaker: Nettie
19.text: And that's not all they'll do inside your head.

44.speaker: Nettie
44.text: Tell me honestly: are you infected? Is that why you're asking?

0.speaker: Player
0.text: No, of course not. I ask everyone that question.

20.speaker: Nettie
20.text: All right. Well, come back if you need anything.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: I hear Halsin's the best healer around. I need to find him.

15.speaker: Nettie
15.text: You and every other soul here.

14.speaker: Nettie
14.text: I can help if something's wrong. I'm no Master Halsin, but I can manage.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I'll take whatever I can get. Heal me.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: What you might 'manage' probably isn't enough. I'll look elsewhere.

39.speaker: Nettie
39.text: Suit yourself. I'll be here if you change your mind.

88.speaker: Nettie
88.text: Just be glad my bedside manner's better than yours.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Healing. Looks like I came to the right person.

58.speaker: Nettie
58.text: I do what I can. For most folks, that's enough.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Are you good enough to treat people, or just pets?

7.speaker: Nettie
7.text: Good enough to tell there's nothing obviously wrong with you.

85.speaker: Nettie
85.text: A bit tired, maybe. But we're all a bit tired.

34.speaker: Nettie
34.text: So. A grey dwarf. Never thought I'd meet a decent one, but I heard what you did out there.
34.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like people of your species, but she's willing to give you a chance.

98.speaker: Nettie
98.text: So. The last time I saw a drow, he tried to slit me open. I hope you're more agreeable.
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns to the playerNodeContext: Doesn't like people of your species, but she's willing to give you a chance.

67.speaker: Nettie
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns to the playerNodeContext: Friendly, but cuts herself off when she sees you're a race she doesn't like

89.speaker: Nettie
89.text: A grey dwarf. Never thought I'd meet a decent one, but I heard what you did at the gates.
89.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like grey dwarves, but will give you the benefit of the doubt.

72.speaker: Nettie
72.text: Drow. Last time I saw one of you folk, he tried to slit me open. I hope you're more agreeable.
72.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like drow, but she's willing to give you a chance.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Where did you see another drow?

26.speaker: Nettie
26.text: Look, you obviously want something. What is it?

81.speaker: Player
81.text: That depends. How good of a healer are you?

93.speaker: Player
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still working on the birdNodeContext: Working on bird, doesn't look up at player

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Excuse me? I'm more important than some bird.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still working on the birdNodeContext: Working on bird, doesn't look up at player

47.speaker: Nettie
47.text: God or fieldmouse, no one's more important than the patient in front of you.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Still working on the birdNodeContext: Working on bird, doesn't look up at player

52.speaker: Nettie
52.text: She's never looked better! I'm impressed.
52.context: InternalNodeContext: Player jokedNodeContext: Wary friendliness

18.speaker: Nettie
18.text: The last time I saw a drow with red eyes, he tried to slit me open. I'm glad to see you're cut from a different cloth.

76.speaker: Nettie
76.text: Never knew drow to be the caring kind. In fact, the last drow I saw tried to slit me open. Glad to see you're different.

71.speaker: Nettie
71.text: And you're a grey dwarf. Never thought I'd meet a decent one, but here you stand.

86.speaker: Nettie
86.text: What can I do for you?

83.speaker: Nettie
83.text: There something I can do for you?

60.speaker: Nettie
60.context: InternalNodeContext: Player jokedNodeContext: Wary friendliness

62.speaker: Nettie
62.text: Poor thing. She fought as hard as she could.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking down at dead birdInternalNodeContext: Edge-case!!NodeContext: Lost a bird she was trying to save

75.speaker: Nettie
75.text: It's the best any of us can do, I suppose.

3.speaker: Nettie
3.text: How are you doing? Feeling any better?

100.speaker: Nettie
100.text: Now, what can I do for you?

80.speaker: Nettie
80.text: I see you. Just give me a moment.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Examining Injured birdNodeContext: Examining Injured bird

82.speaker: Nettie
82.text: Yes? Discovered some new ache, have you?

94.speaker: Nettie
94.text: Heard about your antics at the gate. You look well for someone that took on a troupe of goblins.
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.NodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.

101.speaker: Nettie
101.text: First you save us from goblins, then you bring Kagha back from the brink. You're making your mark.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.NodeContext: Examining injured bird. Glances up from her work to look at player.
